heading: Assertive
firstVal: ability to express your needs in a confident and respectful manner

heading: Rapport building
firstVal: To be curious about others and enjoying connecting.

heading: Flexibility
firstVal: Be open-minded about possibilities. Be willing to adapt.

heading: Intuition
firstVal: Do what feels right. Listen to your heart

heading: Trust
firstVal: Believe in yourself and others for something to work out.
